name: luneo-platform

scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.ci: npm run turbo:lint && npm run turbo:typecheck && npm run turbo:build
scripts.security:all: npm run security:audit && pnpm audit --audit-level=moderate && npm run security:owasp
scripts.perf:k6:backend: bash -lc "mkdir -p tests/performance/results && docker run --rm -i --network host -e K6_BASE_URL=\${K6_BASE_URL:-http://host.docker.internal:3000/api/v1} -e K6_API_KEY=\${K6_API_KEY:-} -e K6_RATE=\${K6_RATE:-40} -e K6_DURATION=\${K6_DURATION:-3m} -e K6_VUS=\${K6_VUS:-25} -e K6_MAX_VUS=\${K6_MAX_VUS:-60} -e K6_SLEEP=\${K6_SLEEP:-0.5} -v \"$(pwd)\":/mnt grafana/k6 run --summary-export /mnt/tests/performance/results/backend-summary.json /mnt/tests/performance/k6/backend-smoke.js"
scripts.perf:k6:quota: bash -lc "mkdir -p tests/performance/results && docker run --rm -i --network host -e BASE_URL=\${BASE_URL:-http://host.docker.internal:3333} -e BRAND_ID=\${BRAND_ID:-dev-brand} -e API_TOKEN=\${API_TOKEN:-replace-me} -e PUBLIC_API_KEY=\${PUBLIC_API_KEY:-pk_dev_token} -v \"$(pwd)\":/mnt grafana/k6 run --summary-export /mnt/tests/performance/results/quota-guardian-summary.json /mnt/tests/k6/usage-quota-guardian.js"
scripts.perf:k6:quota-share: bash -lc "docker run --rm -i --network host -e API_BASE=\${API_BASE:-http://host.docker.internal:3333/api/v1} -e FRONTEND_URL=\${FRONTEND_URL:-http://host.docker.internal:3000} -e BRAND_ID=\${BRAND_ID:-dev-brand} -e AUTH_TOKEN=\${AUTH_TOKEN:-replace-me} -v \"$(pwd)\":/mnt grafana/k6 run /mnt/tests/k6/quota-share-topup.js"

author: Luneo Team
description: Luneo Platform - AI-powered design & e-commerce monorepo
